info.name: Clean WaniKani for mobile
info.description:
My attempt to creat a clean WK theme for andoid

includes so far:

- removed recent unlocks
- removed recent burned items
- removed critical items
- removed extra study
- removed review and lesson button in header
- removed item legend and 'new' badge

- bit cleaner footer

- burned items in gold

- review and lesson buttons smaller and besides each other

- grid layout for level / radical / kanji / vocab tab
- bruned items faded out and gold instead of black
